question: National School of Drama’s 11th Bal Sangam is to be organized in which city?
explanation: National School of Drama’s 11th Bal Sangam is to be held in New Delhi. The National School of Drama (NSD) will provide a stage to traditional performing arts and folk theatre dedicated to children. It is a confluence of folk and traditional art forms performed by children. Twelve States including Assam, Odisha, Punjab, Rajasthan and Gujarat are participating in the event. 12 folk presentations and three folk theatres programme will be displayed.
